name: pulumi-az-remote-pipelines-task
description: Azure Pipelines task extension for running Pulumi apps where state is managed remotely via blob storage and secrets encrypted via a auto generated passphrase stored in key vault.
author: dan.hyrjak@zing.dev

inputs.name: pulumiVersion
inputs.label: Pulumi Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Pulumi version that should be used. If you require a specific version then the format is '1.1.0' or if you just need the latest version then 'latest' can be used.

inputs.name: stack
inputs.label: Stack Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Pulumi Stack against which to run the commands. Can only contain alphanumeric characters or dashes and must start with a letter.

inputs.name: azureSubscription
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment. Note: blob storage used for state and keyvault must be accessiable via this connection.

inputs.name: storageAccountName
inputs.label: State Storage Account Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Blob Storage account name of the account holding the container that stores the Pulumi State file for Pulumi Stack.

inputs.name: containerName
inputs.label: State Storage Container Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Blob Storage Container that stores the Pulumi State file for Pulumi Stack.

inputs.name: keyVaultName
inputs.label: KeyVault Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Key Vault that holds the passphrase used to encrypt secrets for the selected Pulumi Stack.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The working directory to set before running the Pulumi command.

inputs.name: cmd
inputs.label: Pulumi Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: For a list of CLI commands and arguments, see [this](https://pulumi.io/reference/commands.html).

inputs.name: args
inputs.label: Command Args
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use space to separate multiple args. For a list of CLI commands and arguments, see [this](https://pulumi.io/reference/commands.html).
